attributes.action: make sure UK companies meet all the costs of exploring for oil in the Falklands Islands, but share equally any profits with the people of Argentina.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would do much to make us all feel more comfortable about making a profit from part of the Earth's resources so far away - it is only an accident of history that we have any rights at all.  We are relatively rich; we can afford to demonstrate that we are sensitive to others' needs and hopes
